panels.description: totalDebt / totalAssets

targets.expr: sum(yearn_strategy{param="totalDebt", vault=~"$vaults"}) / on(vault, version) sum(yearn_vault{param="totalAssets", vault=~"$vaults"})

panels.description: Total amount of Gain - Loss

targets.expr: sum by (strategy) (yearn_strategy{param=~"totalGain", vault=~"$vaults"}) - sum by (strategy) (yearn_strategy{param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults"})

panels.title: Total Gain - Loss

panels.description: Rate of change of total 5m delta

targets.expr: sum by (strategy) (delta(yearn_strategy{param=~"totalGain", vault=~"$vaults"}[5m])) - sum by (strategy) (delta(yearn_strategy{param="totalLoss", vault=~"$vaults"}[5m]))
